p: Swiss albino mice and Spragueâ€“Dawley rats were obtained from the animal breeding house of the Department of Pharmacology and Toxicology, Mekelle University. Before starting the experiments, all the animals were housed individually in the standard plastic cage inside the experimental laboratory room (natural light/dark cycles) with free access to standard food and tap water. The study clearance was obtained from the Health Research Ethics Review Committee of the College of Health Sciences, Mekelle University, with protocol number 1538/2018.
